item.title: Report X-2024072072
item.description:
Report X-2024072072

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-29T09:15:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-19
  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A SUPERVISOR ON THE BLACK BELT CALLED RESPONDER ON THE RADIO INDICATING THERE WAS A LEAKING HAZMAT BY BAY 5. ALSO NOTICED A FLAMMABLE GAS DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL ON THE SIDE OF THE PACKAGE. RESPONDER PROCEEDED TO CONTAIN THE DAMAGE IN A SPILL TRAY AND TRANSER IT TO THE DMP FOR PROCESSING.
